text: but you're only developing your skillset if you review your day sufficiently and I'll tell you some of my best trading strategies, my own personal ones, my best setups in the marketplace are ones that were the setups that I was losing so much money so for example if I was you know trading into a low volume void and I was offering the on the ladder and I would I would keep on selling that for a week on end and keep on losing money and then keep on trying to work out why am I always losing money and then what would happen I'll work out what I was actually observing and I'll actually start becoming the buyer on that side and all of a sudden a strategy that was losing money and as long as I maintain my money management starts becoming a really effective profitable strategy the other way around so really your old losing strategy Strategies can become your next really vital edge winning strategies
